1260710.name: Lusitania: The Experience
1260710.description:
Welcome aboard the RMS Lusitania, a luxurious ocean liner that was sunk by a German U-boat during World War 1.


This simulation provides a unique experience revolving around the tragic sinking of the RMS Lusitania. You take on the role of William Thomas Turner, the captain of the ocean liner. Witness the events unfold of how this great liner was sunk, featuring a real-time sinking of 18 minutes. Experience the moment the torpedo struck the ship causing it to take on water immediately. Become immersed in the jaw-dropping scenery and visuals that this experience has to offer. Stay and go down with the ocean liner or go on a lifeboat before it's too late.

What you experience in this simulation is based on accurate representations of what occurred during the RMS Lusitania's final moments.

This game focuses on a first person simulation experience.

OUR OTHER GAMES:
